title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config and data into a single Modelfile.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull & push models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLM & embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-user support, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Python template showing Ollama + ChromaDB retrieval-augmented generation pipeline.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, markdown rendering, REPL mode.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as Generator or Embedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, embed, list, pull/push APIs and dependency-injection helper.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for CPU & GPU (CUDA/ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s chat, embed and model APIs.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; chat, embeddings, and model management in ~200 lines.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with thread support and rate limits.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to servers with slash commands, context windows and admin ACL.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of ready-to-use Modelfiles for code, chat, function-calling and multilingual models.
